summary: Abundance explores the complex interplay between excess, scarcity, and waste in modern economic systems. It delves into the critique of decentralization in blockchain and cryptocurrency, examining how the pursuit of abundance can lead to unintended consequences. This concept challenges traditional notions of value, encouraging a reevaluation of our relationship with resources and waste. It intersects with ideas of capitalism, sustainability, and artistic practices that reimagine our understanding of nature, culture, and material excess.
excerpt: The article explores decentralization, excess, and waste in modern society. It critiques blockchain and cryptocurrency, examines scarcity and abundance in capitalism, and discusses how art challenges conventional notions of nature, culture, and waste.
